effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder’s Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains HP effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 HP effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s maximum HP to grow more after battling.
